Room.Name: Lankshire Parkway
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Lankshire Parkway, just north of Netherworld Lane.
Room.LongDescription: You can see the intersection with Netherworld Lane to the south of here through the clear plains of the farm land. On the east side of the road, you can see the Bushman Farms Fresh Farm Fruit market where they sell all the interesting varieties of fruits and vegetables that they grow on the farm.
